review: Rounders is an awesome movie for anyone that likes the game of poker.  If you don't know the rules to Texas Hold'em then you might have a problem picking up what's going on during the Showdown hands between Damon and Malkovich.  Norton does a great job playing the role of Worm, who brings Damon into his problems on more than one occassion.  Bottom Line  Good movie for anyone, Must-see for poker fans.
